plans.label: Community
plans.description: For indie devs, students, OSS maintainers, and small teams.
features: Self Hosted or Hosted by Kodus
Unlimited PRs using your own API key

plans.label: Teams BYOK
plans.description: For product engineering teams (5–50 devs) that need noise-controlled reviews, governance, and metrics. And want to bring your own API key.
features: Unlimited PRs using your own API key

plans.label: Teams + AI Tokens
plans.description: For product engineering teams (5–50 devs) that need noise-controlled reviews, governance, and metrics. And want to use our AI Tokens API key.
features: Unlimited PRs using our AI Tokens API key

plans.label: Enterprise
plans.description: For large or regulated orgs that require hardened security, auditability, and hands-on onboarding—in.
features: Unlimited PRs using our AI Tokens API key
Up to 5 hours month dedicated support with personalized onboarding
Private Discord Channel and Email Support
